mapper.select: SELECT group_user.id, user.id AS userId, user.name, user.weChat, user.qq, user.birth, user.issue_date, user.expiry_date, user.birth_place, user.issue_place, user.gender, user.identity_card, user.passport, user.phone, group_user.cphone, user.email, user.photo, group_user.position_flag, group_user.cphone, group_user.type, group_user.code FROM user JOIN group_user ON user.id = group_user.user WHERE group_user.group = #{groupid}

SELECT group_user.id, user.id AS userId, user.name, user.weChat, user.qq, user.birth, user.issue_date, user.expiry_date, user.birth_place, user.issue_place, user.gender, user.identity_card, user.passport, user.phone, group_user.cphone, user.email, user.photo, group_user.position_flag, group_user.cphone, group_user.`group`, group_user.code, group_user.type, group_user.im_token, `group`.tel_function, `group`.chat_id, `group`.to_date AS 'endDate', qc.client_number, qc.client_pwd FROM user JOIN group_user ON user.id = group_user.`user` JOIN `group` ON group_user.`group` = `group`.id LEFT JOIN qingma_client qc on qc.id = user.id WHERE group_user.code = #{code}
